lines.text: In the last five hours, I've told my story to a sergeant, a lieutenant, two captains and one guy who was a janitor for a I know.
[after listening to Brewster's offer to help him dominate the Qumir oil fields]
Okay, let me get this straight. If I say no, you'll have me kill, right?
But if I say yes, I get a yacht, a ferrari, I can date Michelle Pfeiffer, whatever, right?
I'm no chump. I'm with you, Ben!
[Merrill and Maya prepare to make there escape]
Hey, Ross. You're good... really good.
[Maya can't seem to start up a helicopter. Merrill is getting frustrated]
The starter's right there, just push the button!
[Maya flips the switch, and they're off]
[after an intense fight, Merrill beats Rawlings by impaling him with a pool cue]

[admitting defeat]
My mama told me there'd be days like this.
Yeah? Well she didn't tell you about this one.
